section.title: Description
section.para: All computations for this component are done in the initialize method. There is no execute method. The HRU pervious and impervious areas are computed using the parameters hru_percent_imperv and hru_area. Subsurface and groundwater reservoir areas are computed by summing the areas of the HRU's that contribute to them.
